sentences.en: "Surely there's something we can do?" interjected Palin.
sentences.cn: “我们一定可以做点儿什么吧？”佩林突然插话道。

sentences.en: But surely this puts a different complexion on things.
sentences.cn: 但是这肯定让局势有了变化。

sentences.en: He knew that under the surgeon's knife he would surely die.
sentences.cn: 他知道他必定会死在外科医生刀下.
他的身体恢复缓慢，但确实是在恢复。

sentences.en: Herbert would surely advise her how to approach the bank.
sentences.cn: 赫伯特一定会就如何与银行接洽向她提供意见。

sentences.en: His actions, to his small perverted mind, were surely forgivable.
sentences.cn: 对他狭隘扭曲的心灵来说，他的行为当然是可以原谅的。

sentences.en: It's great to have you back. Congratulations are surely in order!
sentences.cn: 你回来真是太好了，就等着向你道贺呢！

sentences.en: She was surely the most distinguished queen consort we have had.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问她是我们拥有的最为出众的王后。

sentences.en: Slowly but surely she started to fall in love with him.
sentences.cn: 虽然过程缓慢，但她无疑开始爱上他了。

sentences.en: Such sinners will surely be punished.
sentences.cn: 这样的罪人必定会受到惩罚。

sentences.en: Surely nobody would suggest turning him out of the house.
sentences.cn: 当然不会有人建议把他从房子里赶出去。

sentences.en: Surely the fetus has a right to life?
Surely you can't be that badly off?
The board of directors must surely have been in Johnstone's pocket.
sentences.cn: 董事会肯定已被约翰斯通掌控了.

sentences.en: Where eastern Germany goes the rest will surely follow.
sentences.cn: 东德怎样做，其他地方一定会效仿。

sentences.en: You wouldn't leave an old friend in the lurch, surely?
sentences.cn: 你总不会对老朋友见死不救吧？

words.tran_cn: 脚踏实地的，稳当的；无差错的
不可避免地,不可改变地
坚定地,不含糊地,镇定地

phrases.tran_cn: 缓慢但扎实地；虽慢但一准

trans.tran_cn: 无疑，一定，确实，（回答）当然，好，保管
